item.title: Cake made out of Cadbury Creme Eggs
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Well I guess it had to be done, for the good of science. Yes, a cake was baked and yes Cadbury creme eggs were used instead of real eggs. (Link courtesy of BoingBoing - Subscribe to BoingBoing's blog via Blog Buzz Machine)
